short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Be inspired by daily words of wisdom.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dailydosequotes is a platform or service that provides a daily dose of inspirational or thought-provoking quotes. Users can expect to receive a brief, meaningful, and often motivational quote on a regular basis to start their day or find inspiration throughout their daily routine. It aims to encourage reflection and positive thinking through concise, impactful statements.

On every new tab, Dailydosequotes offers unique inspiration.Unite with us in incorporating motivation into our daily lives through the act of joining hands. By clicking "Add to Chrome,", I accept and agree to installing the dailydosequotes extension and setting Chrome's new tab search to that provided by the service and the terms of use and privacy policy.The search will be powered by Bing.

Features:-
The core feature of Dailydosequotes would be the daily delivery of motivational, inspirational, or thought-provoking quotes.Inspirational quotes are displayed when clicking on a new tab.
Terms of use: https://dailydosequote.com/terms/
Privacy policy: https://dailydosequote.com/privacy/
Upon installation, the extension will guide users to a "thank you" page through redirection.
